abstract: The El Capitan update includes many enhancements to popular tools and programs, but many bugs have also been reported.
snippet: The El Capitan update includes many enhancements to popular tools and programs, but many bugs have also been reported.
lead_paragraph: Q. My MacBook has been nagging me to update to OS X El Capitan for the last few months, but I have read a lot of negative feedback about the system. How bad is it and is it worth upgrading?

headline.main: Should You Update to Apple OS X El Capitan?
